response.overview: About the West Point cheating scandal. I taught microbiology for 50 years. When I had a student who had cheated but swhom i thought was redeemable, I would make him or her watch this move and tell me about its lessons for him or her. Some students actually thanked me.
response.tagline: TeAch students about honor codes, and how only some are guided by them.
response.title: Codebreakers
